channel.title: None of my clients load
channel.description:
So, everytime i get a client, it never loads... i get a error saying the system cannot find the specified path. But i edited it properly. My client code: [b]@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/b]
Help?

item.title: None of my clients load
item.dc:creator: @fourscape fourscape
item.description:
@fourscape wrote:

So, everytime i get a client, it never loads… i get a error saying the system cannot find the specified path. But i edited it properly.
My client code:
@echo off
Title Client
cd ./
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Help?

Read full topic
